segments.source_content:
---
id: getting-started-without-a-framework
title: Get Started Without a Framework
hide_table_of_contents: true
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64
@@untranslatable_placeholder_10c4cb47

segments.source_content: import RemoveGlobalCLI from './\_remove-global-cli.md';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_776da23d

segments.source_content: <PlatformSupport platforms={['android', 'ios', 'macOS', 'tv', 'watchOS', 'web', 'windows', 'visionOS']} />

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_899bc9b4

segments.source_content: If you have constraints that are not served well by a [Framework](/architecture/glossary#react-native-framework), or you prefer to write your own Framework, you can create a React Native app without using a Framework.

translations.zh-hant: 如果現有的[框架](/architecture/glossary#react-native-framework)無法滿足您的需求，或者您偏好自行開發框架，您可以在不使用框架的情況下建立 React Native 應用程式。

segments.source_content: To do so, you'll first need to [set up your environment](set-up-your-environment). Once you're set up, continue with the steps below to create an application and start developing.

translations.zh-hant: 為此，您首先需要[設定開發環境](set-up-your-environment)。完成環境設定後，請按照以下步驟建立應用程式並開始開發。

segments.source_content: ### Step 1: Creating a new application

translations.zh-hant: ### 步驟 1：建立新應用程式

segments.source_content: <RemoveGlobalCLI />

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5dfba1c3

segments.source_content: You can use [React Native Community CLI](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli) to generate a new project. Let's create a new React Native project called "AwesomeProject":

translations.zh-hant: 您可以使用 [React Native Community CLI](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli) 來生成新專案。讓我們建立一個名為「AwesomeProject」的 React Native 專案：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx @react-native-community/cli@latest init AwesomeProject
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a89b882e

segments.source_content: This is not necessary if you are integrating React Native into an existing application, or if you've installed [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/) in your project, or if you're adding Android support to an existing React Native project (see [Integration with Existing Apps](integration-with-existing-apps.md)). You can also use a third-party CLI to set up your React Native app, such as [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite).

translations.zh-hant: 如果您是將 React Native 整合至現有應用程式、已在專案中安裝 [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/)，或是為現有 React Native 專案新增 Android 支援（請參閱[與現有應用程式整合](integration-with-existing-apps.md)），則無需此步驟。您也可以使用第三方 CLI（如 [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite)）來設定 React Native 應用程式。

segments.source_content:
:::info

If you are having trouble with iOS, try to reinstall the dependencies by running:

1. `cd ios` to navigate to the `ios` folder.
2. `bundle install` to install [Bundler](https://bundler.io/)
3. `bundle exec pod install` to install the iOS dependencies managed by CocoaPods.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

若在 iOS 環境遇到問題，請嘗試重新安裝依賴套件：

1. 執行 `cd ios` 進入 `ios` 資料夾。
2. 執行 `bundle install` 安裝 [Bundler](https://bundler.io/)。
3. 執行 `bundle exec pod install` 安裝由 CocoaPods 管理的 iOS 依賴套件。

:::

segments.source_content: #### [Optional] Using a specific version or template

translations.zh-hant: #### [選用] 使用特定版本或模板

segments.source_content: If you want to start a new project with a specific React Native version, you can use the `--version` argument:

translations.zh-hant: 若要使用特定 React Native 版本建立新專案，可加入 `--version` 參數：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx @react-native-community/cli@X.XX.X init AwesomeProject --version X.XX.X
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4ec2920d

segments.source_content: You can also start a project with a custom React Native template with the `--template` argument, read more [here](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli/blob/main/docs/init.md#initializing-project-with-custom-template).

translations.zh-hant: 您也可以透過 `--template` 參數使用自訂的 React Native 模板建立專案，詳情請參閱[此文件](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli/blob/main/docs/init.md#initializing-project-with-custom-template)。

segments.source_content: ### Step 2: Start Metro

translations.zh-hant: ### 步驟 2：啟動 Metro

segments.source_content: [**Metro**](https://metrobundler.dev/) is the JavaScript build tool for React Native. To start the Metro development server, run the following from your project folder:

translations.zh-hant: [**Metro**](https://metrobundler.dev/) 是 React Native 的 JavaScript 建置工具。請在專案資料夾中執行以下指令以啟動 Metro 開發伺服器：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm start
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn start
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_6b969f9f

segments.source_content:
:::note
If you're familiar with web development, Metro is similar to bundlers such as Vite and webpack, but is designed end-to-end for React Native. For instance, Metro uses [Babel](https://babel.dev/) to transform syntax such as JSX into executable JavaScript.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note
若您熟悉網頁開發，Metro 的功能類似於 Vite 或 webpack 等打包工具，但專為 React Native 量身打造。例如，Metro 會使用 [Babel](https://babel.dev/) 將 JSX 等語法轉換為可執行的 JavaScript 程式碼。
:::

segments.source_content: ### Step 3: Start your application

translations.zh-hant: ### 步驟 3：啟動應用程式

segments.source_content: Let Metro Bundler run in its own terminal. Open a new terminal inside your React Native project folder. Run the following:

translations.zh-hant: 讓 Metro Bundler 在獨立終端機中持續運行。在 React Native 專案資料夾內開啟新終端機，執行以下指令：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm run android
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn android
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_2128cb26

segments.source_content: If everything is set up correctly, you should see your new app running in your Android emulator shortly.

translations.zh-hant: 若所有設定皆正確，您應能在短時間內於 Android 模擬器中看到新應用程式運行。

segments.source_content: This is one way to run your app - you can also run it directly from within Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 這是執行應用程式的方式之一，您也可以直接透過 Android Studio 運行。

segments.source_content: > If you can't get this to work, see the [Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md) page.

translations.zh-hant: > 若無法順利執行，請參閱[疑難排解](troubleshooting.md)頁面。

segments.source_content: ### Step 4: Modifying your app

translations.zh-hant: ### 步驟 4：修改應用程式

segments.source_content: Now that you have successfully run the app, let's modify it.

translations.zh-hant: 現在您已成功運行應用程式，接下來讓我們進行修改。

segments.source_content:
- Open `App.tsx` in your text editor of choice and edit some lines.
- Press the <kbd>R</kbd> key twice or select `Reload` from the Dev Menu (<kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>M</kbd>) to see your changes!

translations.zh-hant:
- 使用您慣用的文字編輯器開啟 `App.tsx` 並編輯部分程式碼。
- 快速按兩下 <kbd>R</kbd> 鍵，或從開發者選單（<kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>M</kbd>）選擇「重新載入」即可查看變更！

segments.source_content: ### That's it!
Congratulations! You've successfully run and modified your first barebone React Native app.

translations.zh-hant: 恭喜！您已成功運行並修改了第一個基礎 React Native 應用程式。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_f018dbb4

segments.source_content: ### Now what?

translations.zh-hant: ### 接下來呢？

segments.source_content:
- If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).
- If you're curious to learn more about React Native, check out the [Introduction to React Native](getting-started).

translations.zh-hant:
- 若您想將此 React Native 程式碼整合至現有應用程式，請參閱[整合指南](integration-with-existing-apps.md)。
- 若想進一步了解 React Native，請查閱[React Native 入門指南](getting-started)。
